caugi 0.0.0.9000

Compute an adjustment set

adjustment_set.Rd

Computes an adjustment set for X -> Y in a DAG.

Usage

adjustment_set(
  cg,
  X = NULL,
  Y = NULL,
  X_index = NULL,
  Y_index = NULL,
  type = c("parents", "backdoor", "optimal")
)

Arguments

cg

A caugi_graph object.

X, Y

Node selectors for exposures and outcomes. Use *_index to pass indices.

X_index, Y_index

Optional numeric 1-based indices.

type

One of "parents", "backdoor", "optimal".

Value

A tibble with a name column (possibly 0 rows).

Details

Types supported:

  • "parents": \(\bigcup \mathrm{Pa}(X)\) minus \(X \cup Y\)

  • "backdoor": Pearl backdoor formula

  • "optimal": O-set (only for single x and single y)
